attributes.action: stop the Royal Parks authority turning open meadow in Regent's Park into artificial football pitches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We. local residents and park users object to the Goals plc five-a-side soccer centre because: 

The development will result in the destruction of a tranquil area of meadow and mature trees in which people walk, sometimes with dogs, jog and enjoy picnics. 
This area also provides a habitat for birds, bats and tawny owls. 
The proposed development will occupy a site three times the size of the previous golf and tennis school. 
Parkland lost to development is likely to be lost forever. 
The Goals Soccer Centre is a commercial endeavour. It will not benefit the local community. 
Planning permission has been applied for, to Westminster Council. It should not be given.
